headline: Why The Avery Dennison (AVY) Story Is Shifting As 2026 Packaging And RFID Assumptions Evolve
summary: Analysts have lifted Avery Dennison price targets in recent research, while the model fair value in this update is held at US$211.90 per share. Those higher targets are being tied to refreshed 2026 assumptions for packaging volumes, intelligent labels adoption, and pricing, as well as a mix of bullish and cautious views on how the company might perform in a still tough packaging market. As you read on, you will see how these shifting assumptions feed into the story and what to watch as the...
